about_the_game:
Welcome to the ULTIMATE RINGTONE DLC for HFTGOOM.

This DLC not only contains an awesome ringtone from HFTGOOM but a special never before seen track from an unreleased alpha version of HFTGOOM.

If that wasn’t enough this ultimate DLC includes a vocal version of the HFTGOOM ringtone.

Additionally the final track of the album includes the developer personally thanking you for buying this DLC pack.

All this at a price so low we are practically giving it away! What an absolute steal!

You will be able to have countless hours of fun after setting it as your phone ringtone while you wander around motel parking lots late at night.

This DLC not only contains an awesome ringtone from HFTGOOM but a special never before seen track from an unreleased alpha version of HFTGOOM.

short_description: THE ULTIMATE RINGTONE DLC FOR HFTGOOM!!! Contains: Ringtone, music tracks, and thank you message. Setting this as your phone's ringtone will let you have countless hours of fun while wandering motel parking lots.
